PIVMat Function Reference<< Prev | Next >> 
extractmode
Band-pass filter at given frequency of a PIVMat time series

Description 
MODE = extractmode(V, INDEX) extracts, using Fourier transform, 
the eigenmode, i.e. the spatial structure of a mode at a given 
frequency #INDEX, from the velocity or scalar field time series V. 
The returned field MODE is a PIVMat structure, defined as the temporal 
band-pass filter at frequency #INDEX of the input fields. The frequency 
integer INDEX is the peak number in the temporal spectrum, and can be 
obtained from the function tempspecf. 
 
Published output in the Help browser 
   showdemo extractmode
